channel.title: First VB6 Prorgam
channel.description:
Well months ago I tried learning VB6 but failed. After a month of break, I come back and finally learned all about VB6. I decided to release my webbrowser to public to see if they think its good for a first program.
So I hope you enjoy using my special webbrowser (Note: The download is at the bottom of this post. In other words, its attatched at the bottom.)
In order for it to work, there are files in the .rar. Add them to (Your Drive):\WINDOWS\system32 Dont add the manifest file and the bin000 file and the .exe. Just add the 2 files there.
Note: Please dont flame since this is my first best created vb6 program
Credits: Daed, And Hellou + vbSkinner for designs.

item.title: First VB6 Prorgam
item.dc:creator: @nade nade
item.description:
@nade wrote:

Don’t post compiled projects without a source code that have nothing to do with programming. Nobody learns from this shit.

By the way nobody has vbSkinner Pro 2 installed on their computer. Noob.

004046F0     A8464000       DD DestinyS.004046A8                     ;  ASCII "C:\Program Files\vbSkinner Pro 2\vbskpro2.oca"
004046F4     D8464000       DD DestinyS.004046D8                     ;  ASCII "vbskpro"
004046F8     74C44000       DD DestinyS.0040C474

Read full topic
